short_summary: Tender Notice with site visits for Test Inc.
full_summary:
=====================================

* **Title (English):** Purchase of Pigs for Research Project
* **Title (French):** Achat de Cochons pour Projet de Recherche
* **Reference Number:** 01B46-24-027
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-01
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-15T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-08-15
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **UNSPSC Code:** 10100000 (Live animals)
* **Description:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking proposals for the purchasing of 125 gilts and 2 boars for a research project.

**Project Details:**
The project will be carried out at the Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The pigs will be used for research purposes.

**Contact Information:**
* **Name:** Nicole LeBlanc
* **Email:** Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (506) 378-2956

**Instructions to Tenderers:**
To download the tender package, please visit: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37245/01b46-24-027-rfp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37245/01b46-24-027-rfp_0.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37245/01b46-24-027-ddp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37245/01b46-24-027-ddp_0.pdf) (French). The tender package includes detailed instructions for submitting a proposal.

Note: The tender has expired. The above information is for reference only.
